recipesJson.name: Masala de Coco
recipesJson.author: Ecrona
recipesJson.description: Chai spiced coconut milk. Working on getting the spice mix balanced with some real bite. The Bavarian cream and meringue seem to be allowing the spices to be flavorful without any real harshness. Base is shamelessly stolen from slashur.

reviews.text: This is the best recipe I’ve mixed all year. Superb Vape! Full body and lip smacking sweetness, I’m a clove fan and subbed TFA clove, it’s the best and is real clove flavor - adds a sweetness that you just can’t get anywhere else. Great mix thanks!
